recommended_display: Show an 'As seen on' / 'Featured on' strip with outlet names and links.
Optionally show a 'Reader ratings snapshot' badge per book (e.g., 'LovelyBooks: 4.2/5 (19 Bewertungen) – Stand: 2026-01-22').
Only display ratings for titles above a threshold (e.g., >= 4.0 stars and >= 10 ratings), otherwise link only.
legal_and_tos_caveats: Even numeric rating data can be governed by platform terms; safest approach is to link rather than copy.
Do not copy/paste Amazon reviews or Amazon rating widgets unless you are compliant with Amazon's Product Advertising/affiliate terms.
For quotes (press blurbs, reviewer snippets): obtain written permission from the rights holder, store proof, and attribute clearly.
